title: T206 Chase blue portrait for sale

posts.post_title: T206 Chase blue portrait for sale
posts.post_content:
PSA 5. $225.00 + $5.00 shipping/insurance. Check or money order only. No PayPal. New York residents must pay sales tax. Please email me at [url]edhans@monkberry.com[/url]. No PMs, please. As always, "I'll take it" takes precedence over ongoing negotiations.

Please visit my newly updated website here: [url]http://t206.monkberry.com/index.html[/url] with lots of new cards and many lowered prices. Thanks, and happy collecting
